<math alttext="4 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>M</mi></math>

Spheres <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math> have the radii and masses indicated in the table. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="rho sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, <math alttext="rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>, and <math alttext="rho sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>, the densities of spheres <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho sub X is greater than, open parenthesis, rho sub Y equals rho sub Z, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="rho sub X is greater than rho sub Z, which is greater than rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, rho sub Y equals rho sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than rho sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="rho sub Z is greater than rho sub Y, which is greater than rho sub x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="rho sub X is greater than rho sub Z, which is greater than rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
